translations.translation: wherein they shall hear no vain talk.
wherein they will not hear any vain talk.
In which they will not hear any lewd speech.
Where they shall neither hear harmful speech nor falsehood.
Wherein you shall not hear vain talk.
Where they hear no idle speech,
where they will hear no idle talk,
They shall hear therein no vain discourse;
where they will not hear any vain talk.
Where they shall hear no (word) of vanity:
Where they shall neither hear harmful speech nor falsehood,
where they will hear no idle talk.
In it you will hear no nonsense.
Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.
[88:11] in which they will not hear (read lā yusma‘u, ‘will not be heard’, or lā tasma‘u, ‘they will not hear’) any vanity, any inane soul, speaking drivel;
(Where) in Paradise (they hear no idle speech) any oath whether it is true or false,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { لاَّ تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لاَغِيَةً } أي لغواً وباطلاً
 ويقال: شتمٌ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وكيف لا ترضى؛ إذ هي متنعمة بسبب ذلك بالسعي { فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ } [الغاشية: 10] متعالية أوصاف نزاهتها ونضارتها عن مدارك العقول ومشاعر الحواس، مصفاة عن مطلق المكاره بحيث { لاَّ تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا } كلمة { لاَغِيَةً } [الغاشية: 11] لا فائدة لها
